mapper.select: select dp.dp_idx, dp.dp_name dutchPayName, date_format(dp.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate, dp.due_date dueDate, t.totalPay from (select sum(price) totalPay, dp_idx from PAYLIST group by dp_idx) t right outer join DUTCHPAYLIST dp on dp.dp_idx = t.dp_idx where dp.pr_idx = #{pr_idx};

select dp.dp_idx, dp.dp_name, dp.cut_option, date_format(dp.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, dp.due_date, p.p_idx, p.pay_name, p.price, p.payer, pg2.paymember_name, pp.prgm_idx p_prgm_idx, pg.paymember_name p_payMember_name from DUTCHPAYLIST dp left outer join PAYLIST p on dp.dp_idx = p.dp_idx left outer join PAYPARTICIPANTS pp on p.p_idx = pp.p_idx left outer join PAYGROUPMEMBER pg on pp.prgm_idx = pg.prgm_idx left outer join PAYGROUPMEMBER pg2 on p.payer = pg2.prgm_idx where dp.pr_idx = #{pr_idx} and dp.dp_idx = #{dp_idx};

select count(*) from ( select DISTINCT prgm_idx from (select payer as prgm_idx, p_idx from PAYLIST union select prgm_idx, p_idx from PAYPARTICIPANTS) A where p_idx in ( select p_idx from PAYLIST where dp_idx in ( select dp_idx from DUTCHPAYLIST where pr_idx = #{pr_idx}))) B where prgm_idx = #{prgm_idx}
